title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Declines 3.2% as All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Sui (SUI) Dropped 6.8% and NEAR Protocol (NEAR) fell 5.8%, leading the index lower from Thursday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3239.11, down 3.2% (-107.44) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SOL (-1.1%) and BCH (-1.8%).
Laggards: SUI (-6.8%) and NEAR (-5.8%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index declined 3.2% with all 20 assets trading lower, led by significant drops in SUI (-6.8%) and NEAR (-5.8%).
